scripts.build_lib_ed: npm run webpack -- ZLibrary=./src/remote.js --output-library-target commonjs2 --output-library ZLibrary -o release/pluginapi.jsm --devtool none --config webpack.config.js --progress --colors
scripts.build_lib_remote: npm run webpack -- ZLibrary=./src/remote.js --output-library ZLibrary -o release/ZLibrary.js --devtool none --config webpack.config.js --progress --colors
scripts.build_lib_remote_prod: npm run webpack -- ZLibrary=./src/remote.js --output-library ZLibrary -o release/ZLibrary.js --devtool none --config webpack.config.js --progress --colors --mode production
